import React from 'react' import LeftMenu from './LeftMenu/LeftMenu' import './Desktop.sass' import CenterMenu from './CenterMenu/CenterMenu' import RightMenu from './RightMenu/RightMenu' import WindowView from './WindowView/WindowView' import Spotify from './Spotify/Spotify' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { selectSpotifyOpen } from '../Redux/appSlice' function Desktop() { return (
} isOpen={useSelector(selectSpotifyOpen)} />
) } export default Desktop
